# Class ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.VersionClass_precedingVersionReference=Preceding version reference
# Creation templates BookVersions.template.newBook=Cr√©er un nouveau livre. ### Missing: BookVersions.template.newLibrary=Create a new library. ### Missing: BookVersions.template.description=Description ### Missing: BookVersions.template.title=Title
# Creation form ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.title=New page creation ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.changedName=The chosen name isn't compatible with the naming policy chosen by your Administrator. A valid variant is proposed below. Please validate if the proposition is fine. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.noCollectionRef=The field [collectionRef] is missing in the URL. It is the reference of the collection (book/library) where to create the page. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.noTemplate=The field [template] is missing in the URL. It is the template to use for creating the new page. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.exists=The page [{0}] already exists, please select a new name. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.noPermission=Your user has no permission to create [{0}]. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.docName=Enter the new {0} ID (different from the name, set later): ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.submit=Create
# Page Creation form ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.newPage=New page ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle=Page title ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle.hint=The title of the page. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned=Unversioned content ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned.hint=When the page is unversioned, the option of creating different content for multiple versions will be disabled and the same content of the page will be displayed in all versions of the book. It will be possible, though, to switch back to versioned content. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.create=Create ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.add=Add ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.name=Name ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.libTitle=Library title
